applyEffect1(int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect1 manages the execution of Personality 1's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the displacement of a student tile onto an island tile.
applyEffect10(String, ArrayList<Color>, ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect10 manages the execution of Personality 10's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the switch between at most two student tiles from the current player's lobby with as many from his board's table.
applyEffect11(String, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect11 manages the execution of Personality 11's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the displacement of a student tile from the card to the acting player's table.
applyEffect12(Color) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect12 manages the execution of Personality 12's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the removal of at most three students of the chosen color from each player's table.
applyEffect3(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect3 manages the execution of Personality 3's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the computation of the players influence on a chosen island.
applyEffect5(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect5 manages the execution of Personality 5's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the ban of the selected island.
applyEffect7(ArrayList<Integer>, ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect7 manages the execution of Personality 7's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the switch between at most three student tiles from the card with as many from the current player's board's lobby.
applyEffect9(Color) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method applyEffect9 manages the execution of Personality 9's effect by calling the ExpertGame class' method responsible for its enforcement: that is the ban of a selected color from the influence computation.
areCardRequirementsSatisfied(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ExpertGame
Method areCardRequirementsSatisfied verifies that preconditions for the activation of a Personality are satisfied.

authenticate() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUIControllers.NicknameController
Method authenticate gets the nickname in the TextField instance and sends it to ClientMessageBuilder instance to build a message, which is then passed to the GUI instance with passToSocket
AvailableTowerMessage - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.messages.UpdateMessages
This message is going to be broadcast to all players in game after a player has chosen its tower notifying all players about the remaining available towers
